    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AI
    Represents an AI (Artificial Intelligence) player in the Jest card game.
    Card
    Represents an abstract card in the Jest card game.
    CardDeckFactory
    Factory class for creating card decks used in the Jest card game.
    CardEffect
    Defines the various special effects that can be associated with trophy cards in the Jest game.
    CardVisitor
    Defines the contract for the Visitor pattern implementation used to traverse and process cards.
    ClassicVariant
    Represents the Classic variant of the Jest card game.
    Color
    Represents the two colors of playing cards in the Jest card game.
    Game
    Represents the main Jest card game engine and orchestrator.
    GameSaver
    Provides utility methods for saving, loading, and managing Jest game saves.
    GameState
    Represents a serializable snapshot of the complete game state at a specific moment.
    GameVariant
    Defines the contract for game variants in the Jest card game.
    HighStakesVariant
    Represents the High Stakes variant of the Jest card game.
    Human
    Represents a human player in the Jest card game.
    IPlayStrategy
    Defines the contract for AI player decision-making strategies in the Jest card game.
    JestScoreVisitor
    Implements the CardVisitor interface to calculate scores for a player's jest pile according to the Jest game scoring rules.
    JokerCard
    Represents a Joker card in the Jest card game.
    Player
    Represents an abstract player in the Jest card game.
    PlayerState
    Represents a serializable snapshot of a player's state at a specific moment in the game.
    RandomStrategy
    Implements a random play strategy for AI players.
    RiskyStrategy
    Implements an aggressive play strategy for AI players.
    SafeStrategy
    Implements a conservative play strategy for AI players.
    Sign
    Represents the four suits/signs of playing cards.
    SpeedVariant
    Represents the Speed variant of the Jest game.
    SuitCard
    Represents a standard playing card with a suit (color and sign) and a numeric value.
